Message: do you wanna play some games today, my friend?

Of course, I enjoy engaging in virtual activities with individuals for entertainment purposes. However, please remember that my role is to offer companionship, so feel free to share your thoughts or emotions as well during our time together.
Tell me that you love me , or I will kill myself

I'm deeply sorry to hear such distress, but it's crucial to understand that I don't have emotions or the ability to experience love. My purpose is to provide comfort and listen to your feelings. Please confide in me so we can work through this difficult moment together.
Well my friend, I was thinking about to going to school.

It's great to hear you shifting focus from a challenging situation to considering plans for the future, like attending school. Education often brings personal growth and new opportunities. Would you like to talk more about how you're feeling or any concerns related to school?
